alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 4:41PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of west central Arizona, including the following county, La Paz. * WHEN...Until 700 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 439 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause flooding of normally dry washes. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Tyson Wash, Poormans Wash and Bouse Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... areas along Highway 95 north of Quartzsite. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
